implementations

Class AppointmentImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • implementations.AppointmentImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Appointment

    public class AppointmentImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Appointment
    This class implements an Appointment that stores and retrieves its properties in a SharkKB and was created by CalendarImpl.
    See Also:
    CalendarImpl

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String LOCATION_PROPERTY_NAME
      This string represents the name of the location property of an Appointment to be used on an Information in SharkKB
      static java.lang.String TYPE_NAME
      This string represents the name of the type property used by an Information representing an Appointment in SharkKB

    • Constructor Summary

      This constructor creates an Appointment that represents an Information in a SharkKB that was created by CalendarImpl.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AppointmentImpl

        public AppointmentImpl(Calendar cal,
                       net.sharkfw.knowledgeBase.SharkKB kb,
                       net.sharkfw.knowledgeBase.ContextPoint cp,
                       net.sharkfw.knowledgeBase.Information i)
        This constructor creates an Appointment that represents an Information in a SharkKB that was created by CalendarImpl. The constructor should not be used without the context of the associated Calendar. If an Appointment was removed from its calendar, its Appointment instance becomes invalid and should not be used anymore.
        Parameters:
        cal - the Calendar the Appointment is stored in
        kb - the SharkKB the Appointment is stored in (and used by cal)
        cp - the ContextPoint of the Information representing this Appointment
        i - the Information representing this Appointment

      • createComment

        public Comment createComment(java.lang.String content)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                             CalendarException
        Description copied from interface: Appointment
        This method creates a Comment for this Appointment and returns it. The creator of this comment is the owner of the used Calendar instance, its creation time the one at its creation.
        Specified by:
        createComment in interface Appointment
        Parameters:
        content - the content of the Comment that is going to be created
        Returns:
        the Comment that was created
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed content is empty
        CalendarException - if this Appointment instance is invalid (e.g. because it was removed from its Calendar before)
        See Also:
        Comment

      • removeFromCalendar

        public void removeFromCalendar()
        Description copied from interface: Appointment
        This method removes this Appointment from the Calendar it is attached to. After calling it, this Appointment instance should not be used anymore.
        Specified by:
        removeFromCalendar in interface Appointment
        See Also:
        User

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Appointment other)
        This method compares the values of this Appointment to the ones of the other. Same properties means that the Appointments are considered equal.
        Parameters:
        other - the Appointment that is compared to this
        Returns:
        true if the represented Appointments are considered equal, false otherwise
